LanguageData.Core.label: Core
LanguageData.DefaultFrameworkRequired.label: Default Framework - Required
LanguageData.DefaultFrameworkRequired.description: This mod is a framework essential for assembly.
LanguageData.CompatibleFramework.label: Compatible Framework
LanguageData.CompatibleFramework.description: This mod is third party framework. It has been tested for assembly compatibility.
LanguageData.DefaultRequired.label: Default - Required
LanguageData.DefaultRequired.description: The mod is included in the assembly and is critical to the game.
LanguageData.DefaultOptional.label: Default - Optional
LanguageData.DefaultOptional.description: The mod is included in the default HSK assembly, but is optional.
LanguageData.NativeAddon.label: Native Addon
LanguageData.NativeAddon.description: The mod has been made specifically for HSK by a Third-Party.
LanguageData.ConversionAddon.label: Conversion Addon
LanguageData.ConversionAddon.description: The mod is a converted version of an existing mod, made to work with HSK.
LanguageData.WorkshopModFullyCompatible.label: Workshop Mod - Fully Compatible
LanguageData.WorkshopModFullyCompatible.description: The mod has been tested for compatibility and is fully compatible with the assembly.
LanguageData.WorkshopModCompatible.label: Workshop Mod - Compatible
LanguageData.WorkshopModCompatible.description: The mod is partially compatible. Modification Needed - Mods requiring balance and conversions to work with HSK.
LanguageData.WorkshopModIncompatible.label: Workshop Mod - Incompatible
LanguageData.WorkshopModIncompatible.description: The mod has been tested for compatibility and is guaranteed to break your game.
LanguageData.UnknownCompatibility.label: Unknown Compatibility
LanguageData.UnknownCompatibility.description: The compatibility of this mod is not known (Default Option when not set).
LanguageData.Patch.label: Patch
LanguageData.Patch.description: Single patch or small patch set.
LanguageData.PatchCollection.label: Patch Collection
LanguageData.EndMod.label: End Mod - No Mods Below These
LanguageData.EndMod.description:
Just don't place mods below.

These are always last:

- RuntimeGC
- Dubs Performance Analyzer
- Wikirim
- PerformanceOptimiser
- Rocketman
